Course_Title: Select 6 credits (400 level) related to the education abroad experience, or the student's major, or complete a thematic concentration
Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; Courses must be selected from the approved list of courses with international focus or in consultation with the International Studies Minor adviser.
